item.title: Version 0.6.4
item.description:
> [!WARNING] > The 0.6.x builds are quite unstable, I learned a good lesson here about getting a bit too carried away on how _easy_ it is to ship features with Claude. Shipping, features and fixes that on the surface were working, but when you started trying to use TermQ as your base tool showed up as not quite ready yet.
## Installation
### macOS App (Recommended) 1. Download `TermQ-0.6.4.dmg` 2. Open the DMG and drag `TermQ.app` to your Applications folder 3. Double-click to launch
### Alternative: Zip Archive 1. Download `TermQ-0.6.4.zip` 2. Unzip and move `TermQ.app` to your Applications folder
### CLI Tool The `termqcli` CLI is bundled inside the app. To install it: 1. Open TermQ.app 2. Go to **TermQ → Settings** (or press ⌘,) 3. Click **Install Command Line Tool**
Or manually: ```bash sudo cp /Applications/TermQ.app/Contents/Resources/termqcli /usr/local/bin/termqcli ```
## Checksums See `checksums.txt` for SHA-256 checksums of all release artifacts.
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/compare/v0.6.3...v0.6.4

item.title: Version 0.6.1
item.description:
## Installation
### macOS App (Recommended) 1. Download `TermQ-0.6.1.dmg` 2. Open the DMG and drag `TermQ.app` to your Applications folder 3. Right-click and select "Open" on first launch (required for unsigned apps)
### Alternative: Zip Archive 1. Download `TermQ-0.6.1.zip` 2. Unzip and move `TermQ.app` to your Applications folder
### CLI Tool The `termqcli` CLI is bundled inside the app. To install it: 1. Open TermQ.app 2. Go to **TermQ → Settings** (or press ⌘,) 3. Click **Install Command Line Tool**
Or manually: ```bash sudo cp /Applications/TermQ.app/Contents/Resources/termqcli /usr/local/bin/termqcli ```
## Checksums See `checksums.txt` for SHA-256 checksums of all release artifacts.
## What's Changed * perf(help): Optimize Help images with pngquant compression by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/41 * fix(help): Fix Bundle.module crash when opening Help in installed app by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/42 * fix(terminal): Fix Restart/Close Session behavior in tab view by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/43 * fix(tabs): Prevent tab header layout shift from spinner by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/44 * fix: Guard focus management during mouse drag to protect text selection by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/45 * fix(help): Reorganize Help topics into sections with headings by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/46 * fix(tmux): Kill tmux sessions when deleting cards and add Kill Session option by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/47 * fix(ux): Add backend restart hint and reorder session menu items by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/48
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1

item.title: Version 0.6.0
item.description:
## Installation
### macOS App (Recommended) 1. Download `TermQ-0.6.0.dmg` 2. Open the DMG and drag `TermQ.app` to your Applications folder 3. Right-click and select "Open" on first launch (required for unsigned apps)
### Alternative: Zip Archive 1. Download `TermQ-0.6.0.zip` 2. Unzip and move `TermQ.app` to your Applications folder
### CLI Tool The `termqcli` CLI is bundled inside the app. To install it: 1. Open TermQ.app 2. Go to **TermQ → Settings** (or press ⌘,) 3. Click **Install Command Line Tool**
Or manually: ```bash sudo cp /Applications/TermQ.app/Contents/Resources/termqcli /usr/local/bin/termqcli ```
## Checksums See `checksums.txt` for SHA-256 checksums of all release artifacts.
## What's Changed * feat(i18n): Add full localization support with 40 languages by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/27 * chore(ci): Consolidate CI/Makefile for local-CI parity by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/30 * refactor: Tech debt cleanup and code quality improvements by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/31 * feat: Add LIVE badge for background terminal sessions by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/32 * feat: Add Kill Terminal option for stuck/unresponsive terminals by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/33 * fix: Improve bell notification reliability and add Dock badge by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/34 * fix(board): Correct same-column card reordering index calculation by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/35 * feat(tabs): Add + button to tab bar for creating new terminals by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/36 * feat: Add duplicate terminal context menu option by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/37 * feat(data): Add backup, restore, and uninstall features by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/38 * feat(tmux): Add tmux backend with control mode, pane rendering, and metadata sync by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/39 * fix(i18n): Fix localization for user-selected languages by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/40
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/compare/v0.5.2...v0.6.0
